result.eng: I like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.
result.ga: Is maith liom bricfeasta mór a ithe ag tús an lae
result.orig: Is maith liom bricfeasta mór a ithe ag tús an lae
result.html: Is maith liom bricfeasta mór a ithe ag tús an laeI like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom bricfeasta mór a iṫe ag tús an laeI like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.

result.eng: What is the soup of the day?
result.html: Cad é anraith an laeWhat is the soup of the day?
result.ponchtml: Cad é anraiṫ an laeWhat is the soup of the day?

result.html: Fanfaimid go meán laeWe'll wait till midday.
result.ponchtml: Fanfaimid go meán laeWe'll wait till midday.

result.eng: The rain will spread east during the day.
result.ga: Leathfaidh an bháisteach soir i rith an lae
result.orig: Leathfaidh an bháisteach soir i rith an lae
result.html: Leathfaidh an bháisteach soir i rith an laeThe rain will spread east during the day.
result.ponchtml: Leaṫfaiḋ an ḃáisteaċ soir i riṫ an laeThe rain will spread east during the day.

result.eng: The applications must be in by midday.
result.ga: Ní mór na hiarratais a bheith istigh faoi mheán lae
result.orig: Ní mór na hiarratais a bheith istigh faoi mheán lae
result.html: Ní mór na hiarratais a bheith istigh faoi mheán laeThe applications must be in by midday.
result.ponchtml: Ní mór na hiarratais a ḃeiṫ istiġ faoi ṁeán laeThe applications must be in by midday.

result.eng: I was standing behind the counter all day.
result.ga: Bhí mé i mo sheasamh taobh thiar den chuntar ar feadh an lae
result.orig: Bhí mé i mo sheasamh taobh thiar den chuntar ar feadh an lae
result.html: Bhí mé i mo sheasamh taobh thiar den chuntar ar feadh an laeI was standing behind the counter all day.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé i mo ẛeasaṁ taoḃ ṫiar den ċuntar ar feaḋ an laeI was standing behind the counter all day.

result.eng: I speak to my friends at midday.
result.ga: Labhraím le mo chairde ag meán lae
result.orig: Labhraím le mo chairde ag meán lae
result.html: Labhraím le mo chairde ag meán laeI speak to my friends at midday.
result.ponchtml: Laḃraím le mo ċairde ag meán laeI speak to my friends at midday.

result.eng: She couldn't make sense of the day's events.
result.ga: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an lae
result.orig: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an lae
result.html: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an laeShe couldn't make sense of the day's events.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí ag dul di ciall a ḃaint as imeaċtaí an laeShe couldn't make sense of the day's events.

result.eng: The building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
result.ga: Thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úid
result.orig: Thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úid
result.html: Thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úidThe building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit an foirgneaṁ go talaṁ gan ċoinne i ndeireaḋ tráṫnóna an lae úidThe building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.

result.eng: At the end of the day, though, these accusations cannot be proven.
result.ga: I ndeireadh an lae ámh ní féidir na líomhaintí seo a chruthú
result.orig: I ndeireadh an lae ámh ní féidir na líomhaintí seo a chruthú
result.html: I ndeireadh an lae ámh ní féidir na líomhaintí seo a chruthúAt the end of the day, though, these accusations cannot be proven.
result.ponchtml: I ndeireaḋ an lae áṁ ní féidir na líoṁaintí seo a ċruṫúAt the end of the day, though, these accusations cannot be proven.

result.eng: They were a day's walk from the place.
result.ga: Bhí siad fá shiúl lae don áit
result.orig: Bhí siad fá shiúl lae don áit
result.html: Bhí siad fá shiúl lae don áitThey were a day's walk from the place.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad fá ẛiúl lae don áitThey were a day's walk from the place.
